answers.answer: I am the same way at 30 weeks, have felt like this for the past two days and I'm having a wicked hard time catching my breath.

question: Today was a bad day. I felt sick all day. I woke up at 9am gagging lik crazy n with a headache, so I went to get sumthon to eat n I went to the store. I got light headed n almost passed out in the store so I had to leave. I came home about 12 Felt nauseous n like shyt so I slept tell 5. When I woke up I still felt sick with this headache I ate n now I just feel nauseous with my headache n my breathing is more heavy idk if I should go to the er or not?????
title: sick! 35 weeks
